SEARCH
Package com.manager

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.manager.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class implements the Date object. Provides methods to validate dates, check for weekends, and compare dates. Implements Comparable to allow sorting of dates.
See Also:
  • Comparable
  • Calendar
